docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: A
docs.text:
因为只会走n+m-1补,所以只需要维护一个数的数量

再加上滚动数组优化dp即可

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
const int N = 5e2 + 10;
const ll mod = 998244353;
int f[2][N][N * 2]; // i j 0
void solve() {
    int n, m, p, q, u, to;
    cin >> n >> m >> p >> q;
    vector<vector<int>> a(n + 1, vector<int>(m + 1));
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++)
            cin >> a[i][j];
    if (!a[1][1])
        f[1][1][1] = 1;
    else
        f[1][1][0] = 1;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        u = i % 2, to = (i + 1) % 2;
        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) // clear
            for (int k = 0; k <= n + m - 1; k++)
                f[to][j][k] = 0;

        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++)
            for (int k = 0; k <= n + m - 1; k++) {
                if (i + 1 <= n)
                    f[to][j][k + !a[i + 1][j]] = (f[to][j][k + !a[i + 1][j]] + f[u][j][k]) % mod;
                if (j + 1 <= m)
                    f[u][j + 1][k + !a[i][j + 1]] = (f[u][j + 1][k + !a[i][j + 1]] + f[u][j][k]) % mod;
            }
    }
    ll ans = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i <= n + m - 1; i++)
        if (i >= p && n + m - 1 - i >= q) {
            ans = (ans + f[n % 2][m][i]) % mod;
        }
    cout << ans << endl;
}
int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    // cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: B
docs.text:
每次贪心的把x/y加入,然后类似求gcd的做法

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
const int N = 1e5 + 100;
void solve() {
    ll x, y, t;
    cin >> x >> y;
    vector<int> ans;
    while (x % y != 0) {
        t = x % y;
        ans.push_back(x / y);
        x = y;
        y = t;
    }
    ans.push_back(x / y);
    cout << (int)ans.size() - 1 << " ";
    for (auto i : ans)
        cout << i << " ";
    cout << endl;
}
int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: F
docs.text:
高精度+dp

先预处理出三个底座的汉诺塔就可以求了

$f4[i]=min(2*f[i-j]+f3[j])$

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
typedef pair<int, int> pii;
const int N = 1e4 + 10, M = 170;
const ll mod = 998244353;
const int LEN = 100009;
struct bign {
    vector<short> a;
    int sign;
    bign() : sign(1) {}
    bign(ll num) : sign(1) { *this = num; }
    bign(string &s) : sign(1) {
        for (int i = (int)s.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--)
            a.push_back(s[i] - '0');
    }
    bign &up() {
        while (a.size() > 1 && !a.back())
            a.pop_back(); // 去除前导零
        for (int i = 1; i < a.size(); i++) {
            a[i] += a[i - 1] / 10;
            a[i - 1] %= 10;
        }
        while (a.back() >= 10) {
            a.push_back(a.back() / 10);
            a[(int)a.size() - 2] %= 10;
        }
        return *this;
    }
    bign operator=(const bign T) {
        a = T.a;
        sign = T.sign;
        return *this;
    }
    bign operator=(ll num) {
        sign = num < 0 ? -1 : 1;
        num = abs(num);
        a.clear();
        while (num)
            a.push_back(num % 10), num /= 10;
        return *this;
    }
    bign &operator+=(const bign &T) {
        if (a.size() < T.a.size())
            a.resize(T.a.size());
        for (int i = 0; i < T.a.size(); i++)
            a[i] += T.a[i];
        return this->up();
    }
    bign operator+(const bign &T) const {
        if (this->sign != T.sign) {
            if (this->sign == -1) {
                return T + *this;
            } else {
                return *this - T;
            }
        }
        bign ans;
        ans.sign = T.sign;
        ans.a.resize(max(a.size(), T.a.size()));
        for (int i = 0; i < max(a.size(), T.a.size()); i++) {
            if (i < a.size())
                ans.a[i] += a[i];
            if (i < T.a.size())
                ans.a[i] += T.a[i];
        }
        return ans.up();
    }
    bign operator*(const bign &T) const {
        bign ans;
        ans.a.resize(a.size() + T.a.size());
        for (int i = 0; i < T.a.size(); i++)
            for (int j = 0; j < a.size(); j++)
                ans.a[i + j] += (a[j] * T.a[i]);
        return ans.up();
    }
    bign operator-(const bign &T) const {
        bign ans;
        if (*this < T) {
            ans = T - *this;
            ans.sign = -1;
        } else {
            for (int i = 0, t = 0; i < a.size(); i++) {
                t = a[i] - t;
                if (i < T.a.size())
                    t -= T.a[i];
                ans.a.push_back((t + 10) % 10);
                if (t < 0)
                    t = 1;
                else
                    t = 0;
            }
        }
        return ans.up();
    }
    bign operator/(const bign &T) const {
        ll i, j;
        bign ans = 0, c = *this;
        for (i = (int)a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
            ans = ans * 10 + a[i];
            for (j = 0; j < 10; j++)
                if (ans < T * (j + 1))
                    break;
            c.a[i] = j;
            ans = ans - T * j;
        }
        return c.up();
    }
    bign operator%(const bign &T) {
        int i, j;
        bign ans = 0;
        for (i = (int)a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
            ans = ans * 10 + a[i];
            for (j = 0; j < 10; j++)
                if (ans < T * (j + 1))
                    break;
            ans = ans - T * j;
        }
        return ans;
    }
    bool operator<(const bign &T) const {
        if (a.size() != T.a.size())
            return a.size() < T.a.size();
        for (int i = a.size() - 1; i >= 0; --i)
            if (a[i] != T.a[i])
                return a[i] < T.a[i];
        return 0;
    }
    bool operator>(const bign &T) const { return T < *this; }
    bool operator<=(const bign &b) const { return !(b < *this); }
    bool operator>=(const bign &b) const { return !(*this < b); }
    bool operator!=(const bign &b) const { return b < *this || *this < b; }
    bool operator==(const bign &b) const { return !(b < *this) && !(b > *this); }

    bool operator>(bign &T) {
        return T < *this;
    }
    friend istream &operator>>(istream &is, bign &T) {
        string s;
        is >> s;
        T.a.clear();
        if (s[0] == '-')
            T.sign = -1;
        for (int i = (int)s.size() - 1; i >= (T.sign != 1); i--)
            T.a.push_back(s[i] - '0');
        return is;
    }
    friend ostream &operator<<(ostream &os, const bign &T) {
        if (T.sign == -1)
            os << '-';
        for (int i = (int)T.a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--)
            os << T.a[i];
        return os;
    }
};
bign f4[N], f3[N];
void solve() {
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    cout << f4[n] << endl;
    // bign a, b;
    // cin >> a >> b;
    // cout << min(a, b) << endl;
}
int main() {

    f3[1] = 1;
    for (int i = 2; i <= 200; i++)
        f3[i] = f3[i - 1] * 2 + 1;
    // cout << endl;
    f4[1] = 1;
    bign two = 2;
    for (int i = 2; i <= 1e4; i++) {
        f4[i] = -1;
        for (int j = 1; j <= min(i - 1, 200); j++)
            if (f4[i] == -1)
                f4[i] = two * f4[i - j] + f3[j];
            else
                f4[i] = min(f4[i], two * f4[i - j] + f3[j]);
    }
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: G
docs.text:
求能整除区间内数最多的数

也就是求区间出现最多的质因数,一个数最多只有7个,然后问题就转化为了求区间众数,可以利用回滚莫队解决

跑的挺快,并没有出现题解说的卡常情况?

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
#define x first
#define y second
#define sum(x) (a[x].sum)
#define tag(x) (a[x].t)
#define ls(x) (a[x].l)
#define rs(x) (a[x].r)
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
typedef pair<int, int> pii;
typedef pair<ll, ll> pll;
typedef double db;
const ll mod = 998244353;
const int N = 5e4 + 100, M = 1e6 + 100;
vector<int> pr;
int cnt[M], cnt1[M];
void solve() {
    int n, q;
    cin >> n >> q;
    vector<array<int, 3>> qry(q);
    vector<int> ans(q), l(n + 1), r(n + 1), bel(n + 1, 0);
    const int B = sqrt(q) + 1;

    vector<vector<int>> fac(n + 1);
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        bel[i] = (i - 1) / B + 1;
        fac[i].clear();
        int x;
        cin >> x;
        for (auto p : pr)
            if (x % p == 0) {
                fac[i].push_back(p);
                while (x % p == 0)
                    x /= p;
            }

        if (x > 1)
            fac[i].push_back(x);
    }
    int tot = n / B;
    for (int i = 1; i <= tot; i++) {
        if (i * B > n)
            break;
        l[i] = (i - 1) * B + 1;
        r[i] = i * B;
    }
    if (r[tot] < n)
        tot++, l[tot] = r[tot - 1] + 1, r[tot] = n;
    for (int i = 0; i < q; i++) {
        int l, r;
        cin >> l >> r;
        qry[i] = {l, r, i};
    }
    sort(qry.begin(), qry.end(), [&](array<int, 3> &a, array<int, 3> &b) {
        if (bel[a[0]] != bel[b[0]])
            return bel[a[0]] < bel[b[0]];
        return a[1] < b[1];
    });

    int L = r[bel[qry[0][0]]] + 1;
    int R = r[bel[qry[0][0]]];
    int now = r[bel[qry[0][0]]];
    int res = 0;
    auto add = [&](int x) -> void {
        for (auto p : fac[x])
            cnt[p]++, res = max(res, cnt[p]);
    };
    auto del = [&](int x) -> void {
        for (auto p : fac[x])
            cnt[p]--;
    };
    for (int i = 0; i < q; i++) {

        if (bel[qry[i][0]] == bel[qry[i][1]]) // 询问在同一块内,暴力求解
        {
            int tmp = 0;
            for (int j = qry[i][0]; j <= qry[i][1]; j++)
                for (auto p : fac[j])
                    cnt1[p]++, tmp = max(tmp, cnt1[p]);

            ans[qry[i][2]] = tmp;
            for (int j = qry[i][0]; j <= qry[i][1]; j++)
                for (auto p : fac[j])
                    cnt1[p]--;
            continue;
        }
        if (now ^ bel[qry[i][0]]) // 需要更新,新的块
        {
            // L=r[bel[qry[i][0]]] + 1  R=r[bel[qry[i][0]]]
            while (R > r[bel[qry[i][0]]])
                del(R), R--;
            while (L < r[bel[qry[i][0]]] + 1)
                del(L), L++;
            res = 0, now = bel[qry[i][0]];
        }
        while (R < qry[i][1])
            add(++R);
        int tmp = res, l1 = L;
        while (l1 > qry[i][0])
            add(--l1);
        ans[qry[i][2]] = res;
        while (l1 < L)
            del(l1), l1++;
        res = tmp;
    }
    for (auto i : ans)
        cout << i << endl;
    while (L <= R)
        del(L), L++;
}
int main() {
    auto getpr = [&](int n) -> void {
        vector<bool> notpr(n + 10);
        for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {
            if (!notpr[i])
                pr.push_back(i);
            for (auto p : pr) {
                if (i * p > n)
                    break;
                notpr[i * p] = 1;
                if (i % p == 0)
                    break;
            }
        }
    };
    getpr(1e3);
    cout << setiosflags(ios::fixed) << setprecision(10);
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: H
docs.text:
神秘结论

1.如果A第一轮扣血扣死,B赢

2.B第一轮被打死或只剩一点,A赢

3.其他情况B赢,无论A怎么操作,B操作完后,A一定和B血量一样

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
const int N = 5e2 + 10;
const ll mod = 998244353;
void solve() {
    int x, y;
    cin >> x >> y;
    if (x >= y + 2 || x == 1)
        cout << "freesin" << endl;
    else
        cout << "pllj" << endl;
}
int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: J
docs.text:
二分答案

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
typedef pair<int, int> pii;
const int N = 5e2 + 10;
const ll mod = 998244353;
void solve() {
    int n, k;
    cin >> n >> k;
    vector<int> a(n + 1);
    vector<int> vis(n + 1);
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
        cin >> a[i];
    auto chk = [&](int x) -> bool {
        set<pii> s;
        map<int, int> mp;
        int ok = 0;
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
            int req = a[i];
            if (s.find({mp[req], req}) != s.end()) {
                s.erase({mp[req], req});
                mp[req] = i;
                s.insert({mp[req], req});
                ok++;
            } else {
                if (s.size() < x)
                    mp[req] = i, s.insert({mp[req], req});
                else {
                    auto t = s.begin();
                    s.erase(t);
                    mp[req] = i, s.insert({mp[req], req});
                }
            }
        }
        return ok >= k;
    };
    int l = 1, r = n;
    while (l < r) {
        int mid = l + r >> 1;
        if (chk(mid))
            r = mid;
        else
            l = mid + 1;
    }
    if (chk(l))
        cout << l << endl;
    else
        cout << "cbddl" << endl;
}
int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    // cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: K
docs.text:
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
void solve() {
    ll n, m;
    cin >> n >> m;
    ll ans = 0;
    for (ll i = 1; i <= n; i++)
        ans += i * i * m;
    cout << ans << endl;
}
int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: L
docs.text:
注意到只与x有关,差分前缀和即可

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
const int N = 1e5 + 100;
void solve() {
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    vector<int> s(N, 0);
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        int x1, y1, x2, y2;

        cin >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2;
        s[x1]++, s[x2]--;
    }
    int ans = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i <= 1e5; i++) {
        s[i] += s[i - 1];
        if (s[i])
            ans++;
    }
    cout << ans << endl;
}
int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    // cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}
